meanings.sent1: He is the mingiest person I know, never sharing anything with others.
meanings.sent2: She gave the mingiest tip to the waiter, barely leaving a coin on the table.
meanings.sent3: The mingiest man in town refused to donate even a penny to the charity.
meanings.sent4: Her mingiest behavior towards her friends made them feel unappreciated.
meanings.sent5: The image of Scrooge McDuck hoarding his coins is the mingiest portrayal of a character.

meanings.definition: Of the smallest size or amount; very small or insignificant.
meanings.sent1: The mingiest pebble on the beach went unnoticed among the larger rocks.
meanings.sent2: She wore the mingiest earrings, barely visible against her dark hair.
meanings.sent3: The mingiest ant in the colony struggled to carry even the tiniest crumb.
meanings.sent4: In the vast universe, our planet is just a mingiest speck of dust.
meanings.sent5: The mingiest star in the sky twinkled faintly, almost invisible to the naked eye.
